name: Owi and the Lost Light
description:
Darkness… That’s all Owi can see when it wakes up, lost in the middle of the forest. Not a single color nearby… Owi knows well enough that the forest is not safe… And… Oh no… Where was its own light?! The darkness…. Owi knows that it has to act fast! And it knows what to do, it has to find its own light. Only with that it’ll be able to feel safe once again. This videogame was developed with my team for the Global Game Jam 2021 which theme was: “Lost and Found”.

Credits:

Idea: All the Team.

Programing: Ignacio Silvain y Facundo Ramos.

Concept Art y 2D Artist: Carolina Marotta.

Character Design: Sofía D’Aqui y Carolina Marotta.

Animations: Sofía D’Aqui. 

Technical artist and ilumination: Sofía D’Aqui. 

Level Design: Paul Parsley, Ignacio Silvain y Facundo Ramos.

Dialogs: Paul Parsley.

Sound Design:  Paul Parsley, Ignacio Silvain y Facundo Ramos.

Project Management: Paul Parsley.

Game Design: All the Team.
